names.pinyin: yi qi yang yin zhong yao

actions: Tonifies the Middle Jiao and augments Qi.
With Mai Men Dong and Wu Wei Zi, for injury to Qi and fluids with shortness of breath and thirst.
Moistens the Lungs, nourishes Yin. nourishes Stomach Yin and generates fluids.
Tonifies Qi, astringes leakage of Lung Qi, tonifies the Kidneys, astringes Jing,astringes sweat and generates fluids.

symptoms: Low back and knee soreness and
Possible tremors of the hands and tongue
manifestations.pulse: Empty and rapid or Thready and rapid
